## LiveSelector.slice() method

Returns a section of an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
slice(start?: number, end?: number): LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

start


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The beginning of the specified portion of the array.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

end


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The end of the specified portion of the array.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[LiveSelector](./kit.liveselector.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, SingleMode&gt;

## Example


```ts
ls.slice(2, 4)
```
